dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Seventeen regions across Kazakhstan are under a storm warning today, May 29th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seventeen regions across Kazakhstan are under a storm warning today, May twenty ninth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A storm warning has been declared in 17 regions of Kazakhstan. On May 29, forecasters are predicting thunderstorms and hail in some regions, and heat and high fire danger in others, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Kazhydromet is forecasting some really severe conditions—like thunderstorms and hail in certain areas, but also extreme heat and fire danger in others.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Kazhydromet is forecasting some really severe conditions-like thunderstorms and hail in certain areas, but also extreme heat and fire danger in others.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 29, forecasters are predicting thunderstorms and hail in some regions, and heat and high fire danger in others, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Shymkent, for example, is expecting thunderstorms with wind gusts up to 20 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Shymkent, for example, is expecting thunderstorms with wind gusts up to twenty meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shymkent " Thunderstorms expected during the day. Northeastern wind shifting to southwest, gusts 15"20 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Turkestan Region could see dust storms in the west and north, on top of that high to extreme fire risk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Turkestan Region could see dust storms in the west and north, on top of that high to extreme fire risk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dust storms in the west and north. High to extreme fire danger in different zones.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's not just the south though—up in Akmola, they're bracing for thunderstorms in multiple parts of the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just the south though-up in Akmola, they're bracing for thunderstorms in multiple parts of the region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Akmola Region " Thunderstorms expected in north, east, and south.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then you've got places like Atyrau dealing with dust storms and temperatures hitting 35 degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then you've got places like Atyrau dealing with dust storms and temperatures hitting thirty five degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Atyrau Region " Dust storms expected in the west and south. Daytime heat up to 35ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That heat just adds to the fire danger, which is extreme there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That heat just adds to the fire danger, which is extreme there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Atyrau, extreme fire danger and 35ÂC heat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, over in East Kazakhstan, they might actually get frosts down to minus two overnight. What a contrast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, over in East Kazakhstan, they might actually get frosts down to minus two overnight. What a contrast.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: East Kazakhstan Region " Rain and snow at night in the north and east. Fog expected. Frosts down to -2ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And Petropavlovsk in the north is looking at thunderstorms and those same strong winds, gusts up to 20 m/s.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And Petropavlovsk in the north is looking at thunderstorms and those same strong winds, gusts up to twenty meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: North Kazakhstan Region " Thunderstorms expected in multiple areas. Wind gusts 15"20 m/s. In Petropavlovsk, thunderstorms and strong winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's like the whole country is experiencing some kind of weather extreme today.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like the whole country is experiencing some kind of weather extreme today.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And with so many regions under high or extreme fire danger, it's a really risky situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with so many regions under high or extreme fire danger, it's a really risky situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Especially with those powerful winds fanning any potential flames.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially with those powerful winds fanning any potential flames.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Even up in Pavlodar and Kostanay, they're warning about extreme fire conditions in the south.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even up in Pavlodar and Kostanay, they're warning about extreme fire conditions in the south.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar Region " High to extreme fire danger. Kostanay Region " Extreme fire danger in the south.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's shows how widespread this alert really is—from dust storms to frosts to fires.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's shows how widespread this alert really is-from dust storms to frosts to fires.
